titles.title: STEWARD Act of 2025
STEWARD Act of 2025
Strategies To Eliminate Waste and Accelerate Recycling Development Act of 2025
STEWARD Act of 2025
Strategies To Eliminate Waste and Accelerate Recycling Development Act of 2025

A bill to establish a pilot grant program to improve recycling accessibility, to require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to carry out certain activities to collect and disseminate data on recycling and composting programs in the United States, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported by Senator Capito without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 7.

committee.name: Senate Environment and Public Works
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
